CREATE DATABASE datascience2023;
GO

USE datascience2023;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA business AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'p39345ghJ@KL95909234nl0zBe'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '?sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-09-01T09:52:26Z&st=2023-08-23T01:52:26Z&spr=https&sig=mB7p5EHDsg8ZvnBYvaT2hQsabFkro6ChFfgJQXjHeWg%3D'
GO

USE datascience2023;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE UPExternalDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://dlsupdsbcscdev7rw.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = UPUserIdentity
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPParquetFileFormat 
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPCSVFileFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '|',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2)
)
